preface: This customer journey aims to better understand the steps users of PARS currently take to achieve their goal within PARS.
title: Customer Journey -
sub_title: Stepping Stone to understand the target audience's current experience
research: Research question 1B: What does the end-to-end user experience of the teachers and administrative staff look like and what are the pain points?
